SELECT
holder.auth ,holder.m_number AS phone ,holder.user_srl AS userSrl ,holder.user_name AS userName
manager.auth ,manager.m_number AS phone ,manager.user_srl AS userSrl ,manager.user_name AS userName
,COUNT(o.obj_srl) AS totalObjCnt FROM users AS manager INNER JOIN obj AS o ON manager.user_srl = o.user_srl INNER JOIN users AS holder ON manager.master_srl = holder.user_srl
WHERE manager.master_srl = ${userSrl} AND o.obj_status IN ('warehousing','warehousing_new')
WHERE manager.user_srl = #{userSrl} AND o.obj_status IN ('warehousing_wait','release_new','release','shipping')

SELECT u.user_srl AS userSrl, u.user_name AS userName, u.auth, IFNULL(objCnt.objCnt,0) AS totalObjCnt FROM users AS u LEFT JOIN obj AS o ON u.user_srl = o.user_srl LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS objCnt, u.user_srl AS userSrl FROM users u LEFT JOIN obj AS o ON u.user_srl = o.user_srl WHERE u.master_srl = #{userSrl} AND u.auth != 'holder' AND o.obj_status IN ('release_new','release','warehousing_wait','shipping') GROUP BY u.user_srl ) AS objCnt ON u.user_srl = objCnt.userSrl WHERE u.master_srl = #{userSrl} AND auth != 'holder' GROUP BY u.user_srl
ORDER BY u.create_at DESC
ORDER BY u.user_name ASC
ORDER BY objCnt.objCnt DESC

SELECT
holder.auth
manager.auth
,IFNULL(o.obj_m,'data') AS modelName ,o.obj_img AS objImage ,DATE_FORMAT(o.obj_status_at,'%Y.%m.%d') AS statusAt ,c.company_name AS companyName FROM obj AS o INNER JOIN users AS manager ON o.user_srl = manager.user_srl INNER JOIN company AS c ON o.company_srl = c.company_srl
INNER JOIN users AS holder ON manager.master_srl = holder.user_srl WHERE manager.master_srl = #{userSrl} AND o.obj_status IN ('warehousing','warehousing_new')
AND o.qr_srl LIKE CONCAT('%','%00%','%')
WHERE o.user_srl = #{userSrl} AND o.obj_status IN ('shipping','release_new','release','warehousing_wait')
ORDER BY o.create_at DESC LIMIT #{limitcount},#{contentnum}

SELECT count(*) FROM obj AS o INNER JOIN users AS u ON o.user_srl = u.user_srl
WHERE u.master_srl = #{userSrl} AND o.obj_status IN ('warehousing','warehousing_new')
WHERE o.user_srl = #{userSrl} AND o.obj_status IN ('shipping','release_new','release','warehousing_wait')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE m_number = #{phone}
